website_summaries.verdict: A sewer extension hose to consider when you need a quick solution for pumping out the RV's waste system.
pros: Comes with 10 feet of hose length
Decent length of usable hose is longer than most factory sewer hoses
Easy to quickly connect during waste management emergencies
cons: The bayonets designed to hold the dump fitting can loosen at times

customer_reviews.title: The Sewer Solution with the 20ft extension worked great. My sewer clean-out is above ground about 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Has added 10 yrs to my life by taking the worry and time consuming task of dumping my tanks off the list. I have my travel trailer stored in a relative's yard and when we visit it's just being at home. The Sewer Solution with the 20ft extension worked great. My sewer clean-out is above ground about 4 inches but that wasn't a problem for the Sewer Solution. I highly recommend the Sewer Solution and I can now throw away my 'stinky slinky'. I was worried about the long 30ft run from my trailer to the clean-out, but SS worked like a charm, the best investment I have made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ValuesDirect2u

customer_reviews.title: It's a cool idea!!
customer_reviews.text: The thought of not having to lug around that 3 inch hose was such a great idea. However the connection to the black tank outlet is not very good and it leaks yuck out while I'm trying to empty my tank. I'd heard so many good things and really wanted this to work. I'll call Valterra and see what they are willing to do to rectify the situation. Until then it remains 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: lstakley

customer_reviews.title: It works but....
customer_reviews.text: So bought this so I could use in my driveway just to clean my tanks for storage. It does work, but the hose connections are very cheap plastic and leak horribly. Plus one should note it takes a lot of water to flush a tank, so not recommended if your dumping into a septic field. Would have expected much better quality for the cost of product and what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ekbruster

customer_reviews.title: If you have the SewerSolution, this item is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: If you have the SewerSolution, get this! I thought I would not need it, but there I was pulling the twist ties off on the first day I got to my site. My neighbor had inconveniently parked his rig on my line with his slide over my area. This forced me to park a little further than I should have (due to my slide). My slinky would have never reached and the SewerSolution without this extension would not have either. The extension was easy to put on and most important, it did not leak.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to.
customer_reviews.text: I took a star off because it didn't come with the hose clamps that the original unit came with. I had to aquire my own. Not a big deal but annoying to get everything out to dump and find out i needed something else.
customer_reviews.author: Branden L.

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't want a longer hose?
customer_reviews.text: I think a couple 1" hose clamps should have been included in the package, but they were inexpensive at Lowes. I bought the 10' hose so I doubled the length of my sewer solution, but if I were to make the purchases again I would buy a 25' hose and just replace the stock hose on the sewer solution. Just two less possible places to leak. Either way I am EXTREMELY satisfied with the sewer solution!
customer_reviews.author: Mark O.

customer_reviews.title: We could not be more happy. The actual sewer solution works uphill
customer_reviews.text: We could not be more happy. The actual sewer solution works uphill..... pumps great, churns everything up and is so much smaller that that huge sewer hose that traditional comes with an RV. This is the extension that makes it longer for longer distant needs. Perfect setup when paired with the sewer solution.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time.
customer_reviews.text: In theory it's a good idea, but the design of my camper drain completely makes the back flush cleaning unfunctional. For me it doesn't help at all, but I do use the nozzle that came with it on the extra hose.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Wanted a return.
customer_reviews.text: The ‘sewer solution’ pump has to be returned. Unfortunately the extension hose was delivered a week prior and return window closed a week earned. We now have a useless extension hose
customer_reviews.author: Kdensfor

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Will Be Using It Soon
customer_reviews.text: Hubby is the one using this product. I bought it when we traded motor homes and he has not hooked it up at the moment. It will be used but just not yet.
customer_reviews.author: Julie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly right for our macerator.
customer_reviews.text: We have a macerator and some camp sites need a longer reach. This did the trick for us. We camp quite a bit and at our age, it is easier to do the set up with the correct length of line the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Denlinger

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Does use alot of water for the black tank but does work. I leave mine attached all the time. Have had no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: masterofnone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and remove as well
customer_reviews.text: Always purchase this with your sewer solution. You may need the extra feet at some RV parks. Easy to install and remove as well. Just remember to turn it clockwise when removing or installing.
customer_reviews.author: juicesqueezer

customer_reviews.title: I love my sewer solution
customer_reviews.text: I love my sewer solution, but needed the extra length, just make sure you have a hose clamp to combine the two together. If you have a sewer solution, I definitely recommend getting the extension, I prefer the 25' but I believe they also have a 10' or 15'
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Attach it and forget it. Once hooked up to waste connector, just curl up the waste hose in the bay until next time. No removing big bulky line and storing.
customer_reviews.author: Whirlaway

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job, but expensive. Don't understand why ...
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job, but expensive. Don't understand why such simple parts need to cost so much.
customer_reviews.author: John Fuselier

customer_reviews.title: Cleanleness
customer_reviews.text: Sewer solution is the best option for any camper we have been 45' from sewer and had zero issues with dumping our tanks
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: Great system for draining your RV black and grey tanks
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an extension for our current setup. It works well and can go much further than the "stinky slinky"
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Eggo

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble with the rest of the sewer solution. I swapped it for the 10' hose that came on it. Seems a little pricey for a hose with no fittings though.
customer_reviews.author: Killroy

customer_reviews.title: ... i don't give it 5 star's is it's a great product. but for the price they should include ...
customer_reviews.text: the only reason i don't give it 5 star's is it's a great product. but for the price they should include a stainless steel hose clamp for the extension connection one side is factory installed the other side needs clamp
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: An essential addition!
customer_reviews.text: This was an essential addition to the Sewer Solutions system! I bought 2 and ran 50' up a 6" incline with no problems at all! A simply awesome system!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory M. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product -- wished it would have shipped with additional hose screw claps.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Use hose clamps of a good quality instead of only using the metal hose connector
customer_reviews.text: Use hose clamps of a good quality instead of only using the metal hose connector. I used this extension as well as 10 feet of pvc going up a grade of 2 feet. It still worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Richards

customer_reviews.title: I installed hose clamps where the two hoses connected. ...
customer_reviews.text: I installed hose clamps where the two hoses connected. There was a kink in the end of the hose where it was fitted to the metal pipe. I cut the kink off and found I needed to heat the hose to get the pipe back into the cut off end.
customer_reviews.author: ERB

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Is a good
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Is a good, kink free drain hose for the sewer solution. I believe the Sewer Solution system should come with the 25 foot length hose standard.
customer_reviews.author: harbib1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just like advertised... cheaper hose works good too..your paying for the name and the design here...
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Closeout

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have for those longer runs, my house is 35ft, most campgrounds so far 10-15ft...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Easy hook up; definitely would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: This works great on our camper. With direct sewer hookup, sure helps not having to have our camper pumped by the "honey wagon".
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this system as it makes a gross job seem ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a part of the "sewer solution". I highly recommend this system as it makes a gross job seem "not so gross".
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Woosypiti

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Value.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very easy to install and use. Helps keeps things clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paul McBride

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: lack of proper instructions lowers ratings clamps would be a huge help
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Big problem solver
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm after I figured out OPEN and Closed. Nice, have not tried with low water pressure..
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a back up but the ten footers I use daily are good. I really like the size instead of the 3 inch slinky.
customer_reviews.author: cndngypsy

customer_reviews.title: The whole sewer solution system si so elegant. You ...
customer_reviews.text: The whole sewer solution system si so elegant. You can use a series of plastic pipes instead of these extension hoses. But these work great
customer_reviews.author: carla meeske

customer_reviews.title: Sewer solution extension
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. As others have said, needs to include hose clamps. Used 2 of these with 1" PVC pipe in the middle to extend to the desired length.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Performed as stated. A little longer to dump, but the convience of the hose, etc makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter J. Reinhardt

customer_reviews.title: I could only give them 3 stars because they leak ...
customer_reviews.text: I could only give them 3 stars because they leak at the connections where they fit together. The fit isn't tight enough and I had to tape them together to keep them from coming apart. But they did the job after the tape was put on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: you will need to buy some hose clamps
customer_reviews.text: this really came in handy running the hose into the basement at home. you will have to buy some hose clamps also to extend original hose.
customer_reviews.author: antone schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: Need to know
customer_reviews.text: When dumping the black sewage tank should I leave the gray tanks open or close the valve
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Cogswell

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to 12V Mascerator systems
customer_reviews.text: The Sewer Solution is a great alternative to the more expensive mascerator systems, with the added advantage of less complexity, no need for 12V power, and fewer parts to break. I use it when I am staying in campgrounds where the sewer dump is up-hill from my RV outlet and it works great for that. I still prefer the 3" gravity hose (also known as the "stinky slinky") because of the speed and force from the high volume dump, but the Sewer Solution is a great alternative for when gravity isn't on your side.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Valterra SewerSolution is the best investment I have made ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, investment in sewer hoses, that is. I love the way the system works and the little storage space it requires. I have the primary system with a 10 feet hose and this 25 feey extension and it all fits into the space, which just barely held the well known slinky before. Draining tanks takes a little longer but that does not bother me at all and given the fact, that my toilet is equipped with a macerator, I just keep the lines open when I am hooked-up in a campground. Some people may worry about blocked lines but I have never had the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say. It is exactly as described; nothing more, nothing less.
customer_reviews.author: Skip Shute

customer_reviews.title: It connects easily to the SewerSolution Syhstem
customer_reviews.text: The extension hose adds the length I needed. It connects easily to the SewerSolution Syhstem.
customer_reviews.author: ap44

customer_reviews.title: Need clamps
customer_reviews.text: Should have come with clamps as hose detaches under pressure.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: 10' Foot Extension
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our RV. Product arrived within the details specified. It is exactly the solution we needed for our RV sewer dumping.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Koehl

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing I can write about this as it is only an extension hose.
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great system for RV'ers. Better than the slinky hose mess.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Pooper Pusher
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use without clamps, no leaks, little pricy
customer_reviews.author: Big Ben

customer_reviews.title: For the lack of a clamp
customer_reviews.text: The kit includes the hose and one aluminum fitting to splice it into the original hose. What is missing are two hose clamps. You know we will need them - how about putting them in the box and saving me a trip to the big box store. What would that cost you, 75 cents?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: joints don't fit as tight as I would like had to add hose clamps
customer_reviews.author: Amob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd bought this with the original Sewer Solution System
customer_reviews.author: sqftfarm@montana.com Sue Miller

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: better than described at half the price of other offers
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Wittenberg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much easier and cleaner to work with then the stinky slinky.
customer_reviews.author: Billy C.

customer_reviews.title: It worked.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased additional hose and was able to easily dump my black tank to a sewer access 100 ft away. It was down hill, about 6 ft lower than the MH.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As part of sewer entire system works great. Seems to be strong but will need to ...
customer_reviews.text: As part of sewer entire system works great. Seems to be strong but will need to see how it stands up to sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: MW BC Canada

customer_reviews.title: Valterra 10' extension hose
customer_reviews.text: So far I haven't had to use the extension hose in conjunction with the Valterra Sewer Solution System, but I did hook it up to make sure I was familiar with how it works. It's so simple to hook up and I would recommend this product to anyone wanting to purchase the Sewer Solution System to make sure you don't find yourself a foot or more short of a dump station.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Raulston

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poop hasn't flowed this freely since the last presidential debates.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesegrit

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a MUST buy for the sewer solution, which a very short hose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item as described. Amazon should be offing this in ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Amazon should be offing this in the 15ft length instead of the 10ft length. Can actually find the 25ft length at a cheaper price per foot on some other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Judy B. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: just wish it had included hose clamps to connect with the other hose.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stull

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed; arrived timely; Camper which ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what was needed; arrived timely; Camper which it will be installed on is at the river; may be a week or so before we can install it cause of high waters//////cant get to camper until water goes down.
customer_reviews.author: CHICKEN-MAN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product works well no more waiting in lines at the dump station
customer_reviews.author: Mark sonnati

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this system is the best I ever had, easy to store I have 40 feet.
customer_reviews.author: charles F Bailey

customer_reviews.title: RV sewer hose
customer_reviews.text: I have several various sizes of this product. They are great. Easier and cleaner to handle than the big sewer hose.
customer_reviews.author: Crewzzr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best solution for RV sewage disposal. Beats trying to level the sewage hose. Great product
customer_reviews.author: T. Craig Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great smooth-walled hose!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sewer solution. This works fine and is a great hose. Don't like the sewer solution though!
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: WAAAAYYYYY too expensive for what it is. Just buy ...
customer_reviews.text: WAAAAYYYYY too expensive for what it is. Just buy pvc hose, a nylon barbed fitting and 2 stainless hose clamps for a quarter of the price at your local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Christian D.

product_meta.title: Valterra SS25 Sewer Solution 25 Ft Extension Hose
product_meta.description: Size:25'The Affordable Macerator System! The SewerSolution provides a water powered high velocity jet nozzle using shear force to pulverize waste and toilet tissue and is strong enough to pump sewage up to 100 feet and 3 feet uphill. The patented system uses the "Venturi Principle" with as little as 15 psi. When the pumping is finished, the swivel jet nozzle cleans the whole system, both upstream (valve/pipe/tank) and downstream (drain hose). SS25 includes one 25' extension hose only.
feature_bullets: 3/4 inch smooth interior and non-kinking hose
For use with the SewerSolution system (SS01)

specifications.Cover Included: Valterra SS25 Extension Hose for SewerSolution System - 25'
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars197 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
